actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the President of the Senate, the President of the Senate pro tempore, and the Majority Leader of the Senate to make certain appointments after the sine die adjournment of the present session.

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the Senate, the President pro tempore, and the Majority Leader to make certain appointments during the sine die adjournment.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the President of the Senate, the President of the Senate pro tempore, and the Majority Leader of the Senate to make certain appointments after the sine die adjournment of the present session.
